SELECT * FROM MATCHING MA JOIN TEAM T ON(T.TEAM_NO = MA.TEAM_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = MA.USER_NO) WHERE (M_STATUS = 'Y' OR M_STATUS = 'ING')
AND (M_DAY <= #{eDate} AND M_DAY >= #{sDate})
AND M_SYSTEM = #{mSystem}
AND(M_STATUS = 'N'
OR TO_CHAR(M_DAY, 'D')=2
OR TO_CHAR(M_DAY, 'D')=3
OR TO_CHAR(M_DAY, 'D')=4
OR TO_CHAR(M_DAY, 'D')=5
OR TO_CHAR(M_DAY, 'D')=6
OR TO_CHAR(M_DAY, 'D')=7
OR TO_CHAR(M_DAY, 'D')=1
)
AND(M_STATUS = 'N'
OR (TO_NUMBER(START_HOUR) >= 0 AND TO_NUMBER(END_HOUR) <= 4)
OR (TO_NUMBER(START_HOUR) >= 4 AND TO_NUMBER(END_HOUR) <= 8)
OR (TO_NUMBER(START_HOUR) >= 8 AND TO_NUMBER(END_HOUR) <= 12)
OR (TO_NUMBER(START_HOUR) >= 12 AND TO_NUMBER(END_HOUR) <= 16)
OR (TO_NUMBER(START_HOUR) >= 16 AND TO_NUMBER(END_HOUR) <= 20)
OR (TO_NUMBER(START_HOUR) >= 20 AND TO_NUMBER(END_HOUR) <= 24)
)
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
